actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act with respect to the role of Congress in the conduct of monetary policy.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act to require the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal Open Market Committee to maintain the long-run growth of the monetary and credit aggregates commensurate with the economy's production potential.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act with respect to the role of Congress in the conduct of monetary policy.
